name: Shishito Pepper Martinis (Peppini)
author: peppini
summary: Classic martini but garnished with blistered shishito peppers and lemon slices. I also like this in a dirty martini. Any roasted or blistered peppers can be used depending on how sweet or hot you may like it.
directions: Heat a heavy cast iron or steel pan over medium-high to high heat and add 1 tablespoon oil
Add the peppers and blister, letting them sit on one side and then tossing a few times until they at blistered all the way around, about 8 minutes total
Lay the lemon slices in the pan so that they are flat to the bottom of the pan
Allow the lemons to color slightly and flip, about 2 minutes total
Sprinkle on flaky salt and drizzle with 1 teaspoon oil
Shake or stir vodka, vermouth, and ice together in batches, adding 1 teaspoon or so of the juices from the bowl of peppers and lemons to each batch
Garnish each martini with a pepper and a slice of lemon
